channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned, 14th August
item.description:
Once again this car has been on our road for the last 4 years have the council done anything about the same people abandoning cars and leaving them on a quiet residential street no they have not

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Verdun Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned, 14th August

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 14th August
item.description:
This car has been abandoned for the last 4 years on this road it is rusting taking up space and is attracting drug dealers - it’s parked in an area of heavy footfall of residents we cannot park anywhere near our houses

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Verdun Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Health hazard that is attracting vermin and unsightly, 14th August
item.description:
Is I can see from you Previous page that Tenants and homeowners have made Southwark council aware of this on going problem that you stated Southwark Council is aware of why has nothing been done about the Constant literaring on Pioneer Street se15 5qh And And fly tipping of the hedgerows That is being leftTo the festive. Not only are we Bombarded with food waste we are now having Nitrous gas cylinders left along the side of the road. Were people put up in their vehicles and sit there for hours taking their nitrous gas. I have lived here for a year and half and I have only Witnessed the hedgerows being cleaned when the hedgerows being cut. This is just not good enough. We are in desperate need of a cleaning service on a regular basis. Hope to hear from you soon Miss Hutton 32 pioneer street se15 5qh

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pioneer Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Childrens slide has a crack, 14th August
item.description:
One of the children's slide has a crack, this is near thw bottom of the slide so may not be seen by child or their caregiver until too late. In this hot weather lots of children are in shorts and sandals adding to the danger

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravenbourne Estate, Southend, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Commercial vehicle parked in residential area creating nuisance, 14th August
item.description:
This commercial vehicle is continously being parked in a residential street. The driver leaves the motor running for extended periods making it difficult to sleep, the vehicle blocks light and is not parked in line with requirements for commercial vehicles

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cadogan Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
